title: Bridge Build
author: Architect Abby
pages: Need to span across that river? Bridges connect your world and provide an iconic view. Form follows function!
A suspension bridge using iron bars or fences can create a modern or industrial look. Experiment with wood for rustic charm.
Arches add grandeur to your spans. Use stone blocks in combination with stairs to achieve a natural, flowing curve.
For added detail, incorporate decorative elements like vines or hanging lanterns. These details breathe life into the construct!
